title: Not Once but Twice
description: Dr. Duert ter Brandt disapproved of Christina's relationship with his brother, Adam, and he made sure they both knew it.True, he didn't stop Chrissy from coming to Holland to work near Adam. Still, he made it clear that her infatuation was not in the best interest of his hospital.But maybe he had other -- hidden -- reasons for hoping that Chrissy would give up her notion of love at first sight . . .
author: Betty Neels
